plays.text: Goal scored by Oleg Tverdovsky assisted by Joe Nieuwendyk and Jeff Friesen
Penalty to Jay Pandolfo 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Andrew Ference
Goal scored by Colin White assisted by Scott Niedermayer and Scott Gomez
Penalty to Ian Moran 2 minutes for Tripping Sergei Brylin
Penalty to Hans Jonsson 2 minutes for Boarding Patrik Elias
Goal scored by Martin Straka assisted by Janne Laukkanen and Mario Lemieux
Goal scored by John Madden unassisted
